mapper.update:
update ci_dependency
project_id = #{projectId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
dependent_id = #{dependentId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
branch = #{branch,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
del_flag = #{delFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update ci_dependency set project_id = #{projectId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, dependent_id = #{dependentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, branch = #{branch,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, del_flag = #{delFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select d.*,p.project_name,pp.project_name parent_name from ci_dependency d left join ci_project p on d.project_id = p.id left join ci_project pp on d.dependent_id = pp.id where d.del_flag!=1
AND p.project_name LIKE CONCAT('%','${projectName}','%')
